Description: Green jasper human-headed heart-scarab; twelve lines of Hieroglyphic text on base including name of Ptahneferu.
Curator's comments: Mentioned by S. Quirke, JEOL 37 (2001-2002), p. 31.
Exhibition history: 2015-2016 5th Oct - 24th Jan. New York. Metropolitan Museum of Art. Middle Kingdom.
